entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 12:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 overnight except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
